ComicInfo.Summary: Dragon recovers from his injuries in the hospital, where he is then suddenly attacked by SuperPatriot. Dragon is able to fend off the attack, and protect his Nurse, Ann Stevens, who is the roommate of Phyllis Deeder.

ComicInfo.Title: War With Superpatriot
